list_definition.definition: a person who is trained to treat ill people

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: You should call the doctor if you are ill
I’ll have to go to the doctor.

list_definition.definition: a person who has gained the highest university degree in any subject

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She was awarded the degree of Doctor of Philosophy.

list_definition.definition: to interfere with; to add something to (usually alcohol or drugs)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I’m doctoring my cold with aspirin.
